title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and chat endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with fuzzy-find model picker and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports streaming, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama with full REST API coverage.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-based streaming and telemetry events.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generative or embedding components in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that proxies user prompts to a local Ollama instance with per-guild model selection.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama for on-demand LLM queries inside channels or DMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app template for building private RAG pipelines using Ollama embeddings and Llama-2-chat.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and can summarize or rewrite selected notes.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama merged into nixpkgs, enabling declarative installs on NixOS.
